name: AlbinoFacts
0:
”Alexa, open Albino Facts and give me an albino fact.”
”Alexa, open Albino Facts and tell me a fact.”
”Alexa, open Albino Facts and tell me some albino trivia.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: albino facts
des: Albinism is a rare genetic disorder that causes those affected to have a wide variety of ailments. As rare as it may be, chances are that you may cross paths with someone with albinism at some point in your life. This skill is a resource with facts about albinism, with plans to turn into a quick reference guide as it develops.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
